trans-unit.target: 适用于的语法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性是一种格式字符串样式语法。

trans-unit.source: You can include parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以包含在参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If the type of the parameter is string or character, enclose the parameter in single quotation marks.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数的类型是字符串或字符，将参数括在单引号中。

trans-unit.source: Quotation marks are not required, if the parameter is a numeric type.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数是数值类型，则不需要，引号引起来。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> collection contains the parameters that are evaluated for the placeholders that are found in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>集合包含的参数，其计算结果中找到的占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control supports filtering data only when in `DataSet` mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件支持筛选数据时，才在`DataSet`模式。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is applied any time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is executed to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件应用随时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>执行方法中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the filter parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，筛选器参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>绑定到的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> property set to `true`, any change in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> selection causes the page to post to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`的任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>的选择会导致页后，可以将发布到服务器和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定到数据源控件具有新的筛选器。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> property was set when the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> is in the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader" /> mode.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> 处于 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 模式中时设置了 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行筛选操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Filtering> event to perform validation operations on filter parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object performs a filter operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Filtering>事件来验证对值执行操作筛选器参数之前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>对象执行筛选器操作。

trans-unit.source: You can cancel the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs> object to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 你可以取消<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A>方法通过设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceFilteringEventArgs>对象传递给`true`。

trans-unit.source: The event is raised only if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: 仅当引发该事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性设置。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of parameters that are associated with any parameter placeholders in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> string.
trans-unit.target: 获取与 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> 字符串中的任何参数占位符关联的参数的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains a set of parameters associated with any parameter placeholders found in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含与在 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression" /> 属性中找到的任何参数占位符相关联的一组参数。

trans-unit.source: The parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> collection are associated with any parameters that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 中的参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>集合了与中指定任何参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The parameter placeholders that are specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> are evaluated by order and matched to parameter objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> collection when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的参数占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>将按顺序进行计算并与中的参数对象匹配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>集合时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Select%2A>调用方法。

trans-unit.source: You should validate any filter parameter value that you receive from the client.
trans-unit.target: 你应验证从客户端接收任何筛选器参数值。

trans-unit.source: The runtime simply substitutes the parameter value into the filter expression and applies it to the <xref:System.Data.DataView> object that is returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 运行时只需将参数值替换到筛选器表达式，并将其应用于<xref:System.Data.DataView>返回的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you are using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property as a security measure to limit the number of items that are returned, you must validate the parameter values before the filtering occurs.
trans-unit.target: 如果你使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性作为一种安全措施来限制返回，你必须筛选发生之前验证参数值的项的数目。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from the Northwind database and filter it using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Northwind 数据库中检索数据和筛选使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control is applied any time the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is executed to retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件应用随时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>执行方法中检索数据。

trans-unit.source: In this example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> property contains a placeholder for a filter parameter, which is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>属性包含一个筛选器参数，它包含在一个占位符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>集合。

trans-unit.source: In addition, the filter parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is bound to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，筛选器参数是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>绑定到的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A> property set to `true`, any change in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> selection causes the page to post information back to the server and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control to rebind to the data source control with the new filter.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件具有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.AutoPostBack%2A>属性设置为`true`的任何更改<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>的选择会导致页发回发到服务器的信息和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件重新绑定到的数据源控件新的筛选器。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> of parameters for the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> property to use to perform the insert database operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> 属性用来执行插入数据库操作的参数的 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" />。

trans-unit.source: If there are no parameters associated with the query or if the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> is not a parameterized SQL query, pass <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果不存在与查询关联的参数，或者如果 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> 不是参数化 SQL 查询，则传递 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Performs an insert operation using the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> SQL string, any parameters that are specified in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters" /> collection, and the values that are in the specified <paramref name="values" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> SQL 字符串、<see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters" /> 集合中指定的所有参数，以及指定的 <paramref name="values" /> 集合中的值执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: A value that represents the number of rows inserted into the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，该值表示插入到基础数据库中的行数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Insert%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A> method, passing the `values` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Insert%2A>方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteInsert%2A>方法，并传递`values`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> cannot establish a connection with the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 无法与基础数据源建立连接。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.CanInsert" /> property is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.CanInsert" /> 属性为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> object uses to insert data into the underlying database.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 对象用来将数据插入到基础数据库中的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: An SQL string that the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> uses to insert data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 插入数据所用的 SQL 字符串。

trans-unit.source: Because different database products use different varieties of SQL, the syntax of the SQL string depends on the current ADO.NET provider being used, which is identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 由于不同的数据库产品使用不同类型的 SQL，因此 SQL 字符串的语法取决于当前正在使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序，该提供程序由 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ProviderName%2A> 属性标识。

trans-unit.source: If the SQL string is a parameterized query or command, the placeholder of the parameter also depends on the ADO.NET provider being used.
trans-unit.target: 如果 SQL 字符串是一个参数化查询或命令，则参数的占位符还取决于所使用的 ADO.NET 提供程序。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the provider is the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which is the default provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> class, the placeholder of the parameter is `'@parameterName'`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该提供程序是<xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>，这是默认提供程序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>类，则参数的占位符是`'@parameterName'`。

trans-unit.source: However, if the provider is set to the <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the placeholder of the parameter is `'?'`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，如果提供程序设置为<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>，则参数的占位符为`'?'`。

trans-unit.source: For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A> property can be an SQL string or the name of a stored procedure, if the data source supports stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>属性可以是一个 SQL 字符串或存储过程的名称，如果数据源支持存储的过程。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: This section contains two code examples.
trans-unit.target: 本部分包含两个代码示例。

trans-unit.source: The first code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 第一个代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The second code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 第二个代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件。

trans-unit.source: The current data in the table is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 表中的当前数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add new records by entering values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from SQL Server, display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 SQL Server 中检索数据，将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the data is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is also displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties, which ensure that the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性，确保所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>是显示。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a record, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with values from the bound columns and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象和参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control into the database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过插入数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>到数据库中，控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the text in the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> property is a SQL statement or the name of a stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> 属性中的文本是 SQL 语句还是存储过程的名称。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: The value is the <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 值为 <see cref="F:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.Text" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommandType%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommandType%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control displays a set of data and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control displays the details for a particular row.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件将显示一组数据和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件显示的特定行的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: The stored procedure name is set in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A> property and is identified as a stored procedure by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A> property to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.StoredProcedure> value.
trans-unit.target: 在中设置的存储的过程名称<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommand%2A>属性，被标识为存储过程，通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertCommandType%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType.StoredProcedure>值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control into the database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过插入数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>到数据库中，控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is not one of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 所选值不是 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandType" /> 值之一。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an insert operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成插入操作后发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserted> event to examine the values of output parameters after an insert operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserted>完成插入操作后，若要检查的值的事件输出参数。

trans-unit.source: The output parameters are available from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object that is associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 输出参数均可用从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>与事件相关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server and display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 检索数据并将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to display details of the selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以显示详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the data is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is also displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties, which ensure that the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性，确保所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>是显示。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface that is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a record, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with values from the bound columns and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象和参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control into the database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过插入数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>到数据库中，控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Occurs before an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 执行插入操作前发生。

trans-unit.source: Handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting> event to perform additional initialization operations that are specific to your application, to validate the values of parameters, or to change the parameter values before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control performs the insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting>事件以执行特定于应用程序，若要验证的值的参数，或更改之前的参数值的附加初始化操作<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件将执行插入操作。

trans-unit.source: The connection to the underlying data source is not yet open when the event handler delegate is called.
trans-unit.target: 与基础数据源的连接未尚未打开时，会调用事件处理程序委托。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, you cannot cancel the database operation directly by calling the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A> method on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object that is exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: 因此，将无法取消该数据库操作，直接通过调用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Cancel%2A>方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>由公开的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>对象。

trans-unit.source: You can, however, cancel the database operation by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以通过设置来取消该数据库操作<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>到`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The example also uses a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to display details of the selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>, and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 此示例还使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以显示详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>，和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object, and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象，并为参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control into the database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过插入数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>到数据库中，控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameters collection containing the parameters that are used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取参数集合，该集合包含由 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> 属性使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" /> that contains the parameters used by the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection" />，它包含 <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand" /> 属性所使用的参数。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A> property contains a parameterized SQL query, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> collection contains any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects that correspond to the parameter placeholders in the SQL string.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertCommand%2A>属性包含参数化的 SQL 查询，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>集合包含任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>对应于 SQL 字符串中的参数占位符的对象。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the ADO.NET provider, the order of the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A> collection might be important.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于 ADO.NET 提供程序中的参数的顺序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.InsertParameters%2A>集合可能会很重要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType> providers associate the parameters in the collection according to the order in which the parameters appear in the parameterized SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Data.Odbc?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序将根据参数在参数化 SQL 查询中出现的顺序集合中的参数相关联。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType> provider, which is the default ADO.NET provider for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control, associates the parameters in the collection by matching the name of the parameter with a placeholder alias in the SQL query.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.SqlClient?displayProperty=nameWithType>提供程序，这是默认的 ADO.NET 提供程序为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件中，将集合中的参数相关联的 SQL 查询中的占位符别名的参数的名称匹配。

trans-unit.source: For more information on parameterized SQL queries and commands, see [Using Parameters with the SqlDataSource Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295).
trans-unit.target: 参数化的 SQL 查询和命令的详细信息，请参阅[SqlDataSource 控件与使用参数](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/403ff44a-dd0b-484d-968e-dcd1dcd4c295)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and a simple Web Forms page.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将数据插入数据库使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控件和一个简单的 Web 窗体页。

trans-unit.source: The current data in the table is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> control.
trans-unit.target: 表中的当前数据显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>控件。

trans-unit.source: You can add new records by entering values in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> controls, and then clicking the **Insert** button.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过输入中的值添加新记录<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控件，，然后单击**插入**按钮。

trans-unit.source: When the **Insert** button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList> is refreshed.
trans-unit.target: 当**插入**单击按钮时，指定的值插入到数据库和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList>进行刷新。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 对象是否保存对其视图状态的更改。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the data source view is marked to save its state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果数据源视图被标记为保存其状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> state to restore.
trans-unit.target: 表示要还原的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView" /> 状态的对象。

trans-unit.source: Restores the previously saved view state for the data source view.
trans-unit.target: 还原数据源视图的以前保存的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This method is primarily used by the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，控件开发人员可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A> method restores view-state information for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> object from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.LoadViewState%2A>方法还原视图状态信息<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>对象从已保存的上一个页面请求<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SaveViewState%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a format string to apply to the names of any parameters that are passed to the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Update" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个格式字符串，该字符串应用于传递给 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete" /> 或 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Update" /> 方法的所有参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a format string applied to the names of any <paramref name="oldValues" /> parameters passed to the <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete" /> or <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Update" /> methods.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示格式的字符串，该格式字符串应用于传递给 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete" /> 或 <see cref="Overload:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Update" /> 方法的所有 <paramref name="oldValues" /> 参数的名称。

trans-unit.source: The default is "{0}".
trans-unit.target: 默认值为“{0}”。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> format string is applied to primary keys only, such as those that are identified by the `DataKeyNames` property of the data-bound control or in delete and update scenarios where the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues> value and a set of `oldValues` is passed to the corresponding data method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>格式字符串应用于仅，主键如那些由标识`DataKeyNames`属性的数据绑定控件或在删除和更新方案其中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ConflictDetection%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues>值和设置的`oldValues`传递给相应的数据方法。

trans-unit.source: In this case, the format string is applied to each parameter name in the `oldValues` collection.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，格式字符串应用于在每个参数名`oldValues`集合。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.OldValuesParameterFormatString?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A> property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OldValuesParameterFormatString%2A>属性存储视图状态中。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Deleted" /> event after the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control has completed a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Deleted" /> 控件完成删除操作后引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleted%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting> event, which is raised before a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Delete%2A> operation occurs.

trans-unit.source: Because this example deletes data from the Northwind database, an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> handler is added to attempt to back up the database to disk before the delete is performed.
trans-unit.target: 因为此示例从 Northwind 数据库中，将删除数据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>添加处理程序，以尝试数据库备份到磁盘之前执行删除操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to retrieve data from Microsoft SQL Server, display it in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control, and use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control to see details of a selected row in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and as a form to insert new records.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何从 Microsoft SQL Server 中检索数据，将其显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制，并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件以查看详细信息中所选行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和为窗体以插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: Initially, the data is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control and the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is also displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.
trans-unit.target: 最初，数据将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制和所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>也会显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls use different data source controls; the one that is associated with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> has the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A> properties, which ensure that the selected row of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> is displayed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件使用不同的数据源控件; 与关联的一个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterExpression%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.FilterParameters%2A>属性，确保所选的行的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>是显示。

trans-unit.source: If you click the automatically generated **Insert** button of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> shows a different user interface, which is used to insert a new record.
trans-unit.target: 如果你单击自动生成**插入**按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>显示不同的用户界面，用于插入新记录。

trans-unit.source: The example uses a stored procedure to insert records and returns the primary key of the inserted row.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用存储的过程以插入记录，并返回插入的行的主键。

trans-unit.source: If you insert a record, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> automatically populates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A> collection with values from the bound columns and calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果插入一条记录，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>自动填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.InsertParameters%2A>集合的值的绑定的列和调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> can infer the correct parameters from any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField> object and a parameter for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField> object when the ASP.NET two-way data-binding syntax is used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>可以推断出正确的参数从任何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BoundField>对象和参数<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplateField>对象时，则 ASP.NET 双向数据绑定使用语法。

trans-unit.source: In this example, an additional parameter is added in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> event handler to handle the primary key that is returned by the stored procedure.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，添加一个附加参数中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>事件处理程序来处理返回的存储过程的主键。

trans-unit.source: Finally, after data is inserted by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control into the database, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A> event handler is called to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted> event, the value of the primary key of the inserted row is displayed, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control is called explicitly to refresh the data.
trans-unit.target: 最后，通过插入数据后<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>到数据库中，控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted%2A>调用事件处理程序来处理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>事件，插入的行的主键将显示出来，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控件被显式调用，以刷新数据。

trans-unit.source: When overriding the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs)" /> method in a derived class, be sure to call the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs)" /> method for the base class so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs)" />方法在派生类中，一定要调用<see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnInserted(System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs)" />方法的基类，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.target: 包含事件数据的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting" /> event before the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> control attempts an insert operation.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Inserting" /> 控件尝试插入操作前引发 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource" /> 事件。
